SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.service

Class SkillService

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.service.SkillService
@Path("/skills") public class SkillService extends Object
SkillService is a JAX-RS resource class that provides RESTful endpoints for skill management, including adding, retrieving, and removing skills for users and projects.

  • Method Details

    • addSkill

      @POST @Path("/add/user") @Consumes("application/json") public void addSkill(@Valid @Valid SkillAddUserDto skillAddUserDto, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws DuplicatedAttributeException, EntityNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, DatabaseOperationException
      Adds a skill to a user's skills.
      Parameters:
      skillAddUserDto - the skill data transfer object for adding a skill to a user.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the skill already exists for the user.
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user or skill is not found.
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.

    • addSkill

      @POST @Path("/add/project") @Consumes("application/json") public void addSkill(@Valid @Valid SkillAddProjectDto skillAddProjectDto) throws DuplicatedAttributeException, DatabaseOperationException, ElementAssociationException, EntityNotFoundException
      Adds a skill to a project's skills.
      Parameters:
      skillAddProjectDto - the skill data transfer object for adding a skill to a project.
      Throws:
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the skill already exists for the project.
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.
      ElementAssociationException - if there is an association error.
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or skill is not found.

    • getAllSkills

      @GET @Path("") @Produces("application/json") public List<SkillGetDto> getAllSkills() throws DatabaseOperationException
      Retrieves all skills.
      Returns:
      a list of skill data transfer objects.
      Throws:
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.

    • getAllSkillsByUser

      @GET @Path("/user/{username}") @Produces("application/json") public List<SkillGetDto> getAllSkillsByUser(@PathParam("username") String username) throws EntityNotFoundException, DatabaseOperationException
      Retrieves all skills for a given user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username.
      Returns:
      a list of skill data transfer objects.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.

    • getAllSkillsByProject

      @GET @Path("/project/{projectId}") @Produces("application/json") public List<SkillGetDto> getAllSkillsByProject(@PathParam("projectId") long projectId) throws DatabaseOperationException
      Retrieves all skills for a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the project ID.
      Returns:
      a list of skill data transfer objects.
      Throws:
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.

    • getAllSkillsByFirstLetter

      @GET @Path("/first/letter") @Produces("application/json") public List<SkillGetDto> getAllSkillsByFirstLetter(@QueryParam("value") String firstLetter) throws DatabaseOperationException
      Retrieves all skills that start with the specified first letter.
      Parameters:
      firstLetter - the first letter to filter skills by.
      Returns:
      a list of skill data transfer objects.
      Throws:
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.

    • getSkillTypes

      @GET @Path("/enum/types") @Produces("application/json") public List<SkillTypeEnum> getSkillTypes()

      Returns:
      a list of skill type enums.

    • removeSkillFromUser

      @PUT @Path("/remove/user") @Consumes("application/json") public void removeSkillFromUser(@Valid @Valid SkillRemoveUserDto skillRemoveUserDto, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException, EntityNotFoundException
      Removes a skill from a user.
      Parameters:
      skillRemoveUserDto - the skill data transfer object for removing a skill from a user.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      EntityNotFoundException - if the skill is not found.

    • removeSkillFromProject

      @PUT @Path("/remove/project/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void removeSkillFromProject(@Valid @Valid SkillRemoveProjectDto skillRemoveProjectDto) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Removes a skill from a project.
      Parameters:
      skillRemoveProjectDto - the skill data transfer object for removing a skill from a project.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the skill or project is not found.
